snippet: The police killed three Islamist activists protesting the war crimes convictions of two of their leaders, while demonstrations calling for the two men to be executed continued.
abstract: Police in Bangladesh kill three Islamist activists who were protesting war crimes convictions of two of their leaders, while demonstrations calling for men to be executed continue.
lead_paragraph: The police killed three Islamist activists protesting the war crimes convictions of two of their leaders, while demonstrations calling for the two men to be executed continued.

keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
keywords.name: subject
